chapters.title: Chapter 27:  To Be Alone
chapters.info: Masema Dagar, p. 446 (572)—The Prophet. He was once one of Uno's underlings, and the one who respected Rand the least, but after he found out that Rand was the Dragon Reborn, he went his own way, preaching of Rand's glory as the “Lord Dragon Reborn.” For more on what Masema has become, read page 433 (612) of The Fires of Heaven. See also Prophet of the Dragon, The.
